movies.title: Inception
movies.overview: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception, the act of planting an idea into someone's mind.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham City into anarchy.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.overview: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
